ideas.title: Subscription Plant Care Service
ideas.description: Provide monthly plant care packages for busy urban professionals, including fertilizers, care guides, and expert consultations. Let people enjoy green living without worrying about plant death.

ideas.title: Time Capsule Coffee Shop
ideas.description: A coffee shop where customers can write letters to their future selves, seal them in the store, and come back to collect them a year later.

ideas.title: AR Virtual Fitting Mirror
ideas.description: Use augmented reality technology to let customers try on any clothing without undressing. Reduce return rates and enhance shopping experience.

ideas.title: Sound Sculpture Installation
ideas.description: Create an interactive art installation that transforms city noise into beautiful visual patterns, making people rethink the relationship between sound and space.

ideas.title: Virtual History Walk
ideas.description: Use VR technology to let students travel to historical event sites, experiencing ancient Roman Colosseum, Egyptian pyramid construction, etc.
